meanings.definition: To insert or place before something else.
meanings.sent1: She preinserts the key into the lock before turning it.
meanings.sent2: He always preinserts the title page before the first chapter in his book.
meanings.sent3: The magician preinserts the rabbit into the hat before the show.
meanings.sent4: The chef preinserts the secret ingredient into the recipe for an extra kick.
meanings.sent5: The gardener preinserts the seeds into the soil to ensure proper growth.

meanings.definition: Items inserted or placed before something else.
meanings.sent1: The preinserts in the box included a welcome letter and a small gift.
meanings.sent2: She organized the preinserts in the folder for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The surprise preinserts in the package made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The preinserts in the envelope added a personal touch to the invitation.
meanings.sent5: He carefully arranged the preinserts on the table before the meeting.
